table.name: vtiger_potentialscalesrel
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_potentialscalesrel` ( `potentialscaleid` int(11) NOT NULL, `potentialscalename` varchar(100) default NULL, `potentialsid` varchar(100) default NULL, `scaleid` varchar(100) default NULL, `scaletime` varchar(100) default NULL, `scale` varchar(100) default NULL, `scalecause` varchar(100) default NULL, `scalestatus` varchar(100) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`potentialscaleid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
